description: Luton Town survival would 'be the biggest story of the season'
title: Luton Town survival would 'be the biggest story of the season'
title_page: Luton Town survival would 'be the biggest story of the season' - BBC Sport
maintext:
Former Chelsea and Scotland winger Pat Nevin has been speaking to BBC Sport to look ahead to the new season: "If Luton stay up, it will be the biggest story of the season.
"It is infamously difficult coming up via the play-offs, but squad size, quality, finances and limited Premier League experience are only some of their other disadvantages.
"They will have to work hard, plan hard and maybe pray hard too."
